data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_utilization IS NULL OR cpu_utilization < 85) AND (disk_utilization IS NULL OR disk_utilization < 85.0) AND (memory_utilization IS NULL OR memory_utilization < 90.0)) AS 'Health Score' FROM google_cloudsql_instance FACET google_cloudsql_instance_name
SELECT uniqueCount(google_cloudsql_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM google_cloudsql_instance FACET tier

presentation.title: Tier Distribution
presentation.notes: The tier or machine type for this instance, for example db-n1-standard-1. For MySQL instances, this field determines whether the instance is Second Generation (recommended) or First Generation. For more information, see pricing.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(google_cloudsql_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM google_cloudsql_instance FACET data_disk_type

presentation.title: Data Disk Type  Distribution
presentation.notes: The type of data disk: PD_SSD (default) or PD_HDD. Applies only to Second Generation instances.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(google_cloudsql_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM google_cloudsql_instance FACET type_of_instance

presentation.title: Type Of Instance Distribution
presentation.notes: The instance type. CLOUD_SQL_INSTANCE, ON_PREMISES_INSTANCE, READ_REPLICA_INSTANCE.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_utilization) FROM google_cloudsql_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: The fraction of the reserved CPU that is currently in use.

data.nrql: SELECT average(disk_utilization) FROM google_cloudsql_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: The fraction of the disk quota that is currently in use.

data.nrql: SELECT average(memory_utilization) FROM google_cloudsql_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Memory Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: The fraction of the memory quota that is currently in use.

data.nrql: SELECT average(read_operations) FROM google_cloudsql_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read Operations (Reads)
presentation.notes: Delta count of data disk read IO operations.

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_operations) FROM google_cloudsql_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write Operations (Writes)
presentation.notes: Delta count of data disk write IO operations.
